item.title: Editing manuscripts in Atom
item.description: I use Atom not only for coding but also for manuscripts editing. It actually makes a ton of sense to me as I write my manuscripts in Markdown and Atom is provided with many powerful features (specific packages, shortcuts, etc.) that once combined make my writing very efficient (I like to think so). Recently, Timoth√©e Poisot shared a very cool setup: Sweet markdown editing setup in @AtomEditor -- using autocomplete-citeproc, markdown-preview-enhanced, and document-outline pic.
